page.title: 12Fishing in Uyeasound.
page.content: In Uyeasound there is sea-fishing as well as loch fishing. Brown trout can be caught in Uyeasound lochs in the fishing season which runs from March 15th to October 6th.Some are caught by fly fishing and some are caught by spinning.These fish can be caught in the Loch of Belmont, Loch of Snarravoe and Loch of Stourhoull.Sea trout can be caught in Summer and Autumn when they are running where burns connect the sea to a loch.Such spots are Snarra Voe and Scata Water. Small fish can be caught when fishing from piers or jetties but more and larger fish can be caught from boats.During the Summer months piltocks,herring,mackeral,haddock, whiting,codling and skate are caught. Many people in Uyeasound enjoy fishing and tourists come to fish.
